```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
Install packages:
```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("gdata")
library("gdata")
#install.packages("sf")
library(sf)
```
load data:
```{r}
HousingData<- read.csv("HousingDB_post2010_inactive_included.csv")
head(HousingData)
city.council.makeup.terms <- read.csv("data/city.council.database.xlsx - terms.csv")
View(city_council_makeup_xlsx_terms)
city.council.splits <- read.csv("data/city.council.database.xlsx - SPLITS.csv")
View(city.council.splits)
```
Bar Charts:
```{r}
councildf<-group_by(HousingData, CouncilDst) %>%
summarise(tot_new = sum(ClassANet))
qplot(x = CouncilDst, y = tot_new, data = councildf, geom = "col")
cbdf<-group_by(HousingData, CommntyDst) %>%
summarise(tot_new = sum(ClassANet))
qplot(x = CommntyDst, y = tot_new, data = cbdf, geom = "col")
```
Add Shape Files:
```{r}
CouncilDistrictBoundaries<- st_read(file ="nycc.shp")
CBDistrictBoundaries<- st_read(file="nycd.shp")
```
